sen.j: 1951年の『雪割草』は、深刻な家族の葛藤を甘いホームドラマのスタイルで描いた作品だが、日本では興行的にも批評の上でも、ごく凡庸な作品との評価に留まった。
sen.e: In Yukiwariso made in 1951, a serious conflict within a family was depicted in a style of a bittersweet family drama, and its content & box-office revenue was said mediocre in Japan.

sen.e: But when introduced along with "Rashomon" (by Akira KUROSAWA) in India, Yukiwariso attracted attention because it was as excellent as Rashomon, so it had a strong impact on Indian movies, which is indicated by many imitation movies modeled after Yukiwariso.
